title: Alcatel 3T 8 3 GB RAM 32 GB ROM 8 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Metallic Black)

product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Battery, AC Power Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Fixed Focus Rear and Front Camera
product_specification.Other Display Features: LED Backlit Multi Touch Display with IPS Technology
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Design: It is slim (8.2 mm thick) and lightweight (279 g), thereby making it your ideal travel partner. The metallic and suede finish gives it a touch of elegance.
product_description.Smooth Performance: With VoLTE and ViLTE, you can get a hassle-free 4G calling experience so that you can enjoy seamless conversations with your loved ones from all around the world. It runs on the Android Oreo OS and its performance is validated through several stability tests to ensure that you a smooth experience. It is powered by 3 GB of RAM, and it comes with 32 GB of internal memory (expandable up to 128 GB) for your apps, photos, videos and other files.
product_description.Android Oreo 8.1: This OS boasts two times faster boot time, along with the integrated Picture-in-Picture (PIP), that not only makes opening apps faster, but also enables seamless multitasking. With a wide range of emojis, the conversations with your best friend will be a lot more interesting.
product_description.Click Away: You can capture amazing 1080p videos at 30 fps with its 8 MP rear camera. You can click gorgeous selfies with its 5 MP front camera. With its HDR mode, the pictures and videos that you capture will be enriched with great clarity and details.
product_description.Kids Mode: Your child can take advantage of the preloaded ad-free apps in this tab, while you can experience total control with its built-in easy-to-use parental control panel that lets you set the usage time and limit the apps available for kids.
product_description.Eye Care Mode: This mode is designed for extended periods of use so that you can view the content on the screen without experiencing fatigue. This exclusive feature reduces the blue light and offers the right amount of brightness and tonality so that you can use the tab without straining your eyes, even in low light.
product_description.Powerful Battery: This tab houses a powerful battery to the device powered up for all your tasks. It is comprehensively tested to give you a seamless performance.
product_description.Google Assistance: With the power of Google by your side, you can conquer any task at hand. Ask Google a question, plan your day, book tables at a fancy restaurant and much more with the help of the Google Assistant - an advanced voice assistant that is preloaded into this tab.
product_description.Entertainment Mode: Enjoy clear streaming at 1280x800 HD for anything you watch on its screen with this mode. Get an enriched audio experience across various audio formats, such as MP3, PCM/WAVE, AAC, AAC+, MIDI, VORBIS and much more. Be it for your multimedia content or gaming experience, thanks to the built-in speaker, your aural experience will be rich and immersive.

review: At this price range it's a good product. A better speaker , display & touch would have made this product more attractive . For normal use other than gaming it appears to be a good buy. Jio works well . Preloaded apps can't be removed .Camera just okay ..battery pretty good and no heating issues till now. Charger cable too short . Data on off toggling with airplane mode ..that's one issue need to fix . Windows key board and android key board works for some office job. It got a preloaded office app upgradable to premium . Apps can be installed to external SD card also. Body average . Weight is also very less easily holdable . As mentioned by flipkart Processor is Mediatek MT8765. But I could not find out this processor from Mediatek official site . What I could figure out from the Baseband version given is MT6739 probably the processor is MT6739 64bit ARM Cortex A53 Octacore 1.5 M Hz about which there is a mention on Mediatek site. What I could put together is if not into heavy gaming , only for some surfing and reading then it's a reasonable buy.

Good product lets see how it works after few months...so came after 6 7 months ..i got it at 5000 and now its price is 9k lol..anyway from my experience i use it to see physics video lectures and it helped me in other education purpose but it lag little and i have to wait for mins to open a pdf file moreover the excell work very slowy from the beginning..camera quality bad....so now i only use for you tube where video quality is good....

I got it for Rs. 7199/- after discount. For this price this is an excellent buy. Pros: Light weight* Good battery * Android 8.1.0* With 4g Volte* You can hold & call easily in one hand. Cons: In sunlight display is very bad. Camera is not that good. Opinion: In this price range, this is very good in hand. I mainly use it for reading purpose with little surfing the net. Not interested in gaming. Go for this tab, if it's for reading, studying & surfing the net for YouTube etc.. I'm not using WhatsApp, Facebook etc.. in this tab. So, I don't know about heavy usages. Overall, This tablet won't disappoint you if you purchase it for around 8k. Thanks.
Device is a great tab with 4G VoLTE support but does not have any front speaker, so any phone call on this tab is always on loud speaker only.
great tablet Mark is 4. very good product tank u Flipkart fast delivery

Overall you can find many other tabs better than this in the market.
1) Not as expected performance for a 3Gb RAM. It's overall below average performance.
2) Even at this price point doesn't have flash and Camera is poor.
3) Shifting from one App to other is slow, very lazy and sleepy.
4) Screen resolution is only upto average.
5) Battery backup is just average.

I am using this Tab for checking emails and reading. Product is worth for the amount. I paid 8.5K after discount. My usage is not heavy. I am playing PUBG and Asphalt with medium display settings without any issues. Please don't expect performance like iPad from this Tab. For normal daily usage it's good. But go for only 3gb RAM and 32gb memory.
NICE LOOKING DEVICE BUT IT DOESN'T HAVE PROPER SPEAKER VERY HARD TO SPEAK OR LISTEN NOT USEFUL AS A MEDIA PLAYER MAINLY SPEAKER IS NOT GOOD OTHER WISE RESPONSE IS FAST GOOD LOOKING

Fastest delivery from flipkart yet. I ordered it at night after 11pm and I received it in the next day morning. That's a great thing about flipkart.
Well, tab is good in budget with good display, good battery, and good processor.
It's good for reading or multimedia purpose. Not good for heavy gaming and camera. For video calling it's okay, but for taking pictures and selfies, it's not recommended.
My main purpose was for reading , so i am completely satisfied with it yet.😊

My honest review.
My use - as a regular phone (yes, and it fits in my pocket perfectly)
Camera - 0.5/5 (just coz it has a camera for the sake of it)
Screen - 4/5 ( watch YouTube videos without any hitch)
Battery - 5/5 (exceptional even thought only 4000 mah)
Speed - 5/5 (I didn't have any problems so far switching between apps)
Speaker - 4/5 (Satisfactory)
Getting a case for this is difficult.
Overall I'm happy with my purchase.
I am not a gamer so I will not comment on this.

At this price range it's a good product. A better speaker , display & touch would have made this product more attractive . For normal use other than gaming it appears to be a good buy. Jio works well . Preloaded apps can't be removed .Camera just okay ..battery pretty good and no heating issues till now. Charger cable too short . Data on off toggling with airplane mode ..that's one issue need to fix . Windows key board and android key board works for some office job. It got a preloaded office app upgradable to premium . Apps can be installed to external SD card also. Body average . Weight is also very less easily holdable . As mentioned by flipkart Processor is Mediatek MT8765. But I could not find out this processor from Mediatek official site . What I could figure out from the Baseband version given is MT6739 probably the processor is MT6739 64bit ARM Cortex A53 Octacore 1.5 M Hz about which there is a mention on Mediatek site. What I could put together is if not into heavy gaming , only for some surfing and reading then it's a reasonable buy.

So far so good!!! Searched a few TABs on Flipkart but opted for Alcatel Tab, it's been more than a week and I can say it's a very good purchase in terms of money spent and performance of this device.
*Good battery back up almost whole day as I spent most of the evening hours on
Loopscoop & Injoy kinda' apps
*Comparatively better display and UI instead of Iball and other low price TABs
*Better RAM management3GB, I get more than 50% most of the times, 21GB
ROM spared even after lids of mp3s and apps installed
*Graphics is tolerable as it's under RS8000 Tab so it's fine and no issues
*So far no lags no heat-ups and no hangs even on multi-tasking and multiple
apps used at same time frame.
*Camera is ok ok as I haven't purchased this TAB for selfies or for clicks, if you
need a better camera TAB then you must go for any mobile phone.
*Screen and display is better and good for even a child's eyes.
Final word; awesome ALCATEL Tab deal for me as it replaced my ageing Micromax canvas 6 and doing great job for me, loved by everyone at my home.

Performance is not as expected. There is some lag in browsing in chrome also. Apps are not optimised. Full screen videos of apps like Hotstar, Jio TV, Sony liv have a white bar at the bottom. It is irritating. Perhaps those apps are not optimised for the device.

CONS:
- Good design and Value for money.
- As mentioned its a product for reading and browsing. Please dont expect a gaming tab at this price.
And dont compare it with iPad or Samsung tablets.
The same specification tablet of samsung may cost more than Rs 20,000.
- Battery Life is good.

PROS:
- Touch is somewhat slow.

Turn off automatic updates of app and system software. Otherwise background process can slow down the performance.

Overall good for those who use it for reading and browsing only.
